channel.title: Web Client Localhost user files
channel.description: ok, where does the web client store user files? i have an account that i did pickup 6585 (ammy of fury), when i tried to equip it it crashed me. now i can't get back in because of the fury in my inventory, so i need to access the account file and take it out. anyone know where the WEB CLIENT (not batch client) stores your account files on LOCALHOST (not a hosted server). Thanks.[br][size=1]Posted at: September 17, 2006, 07:14:07 PM[/size][hr]By the way, the web client is running HybridScape server at 127.0.0.1, that's where i'm trying to find my file.[br][size=1]Posted at: September 17, 2006, 07:18:32 PM[/size][hr]Nevermind i think i found it in C:windows.mpr_file_store_32characters

item.title: Web Client Localhost user files
item.dc:creator: @littleplop littleplop
item.description:
@littleplop wrote:

update your item.java and your item.cfg add it in or download a better one… shod work if your useing a late client like moparscape3.2
check out my site all
soulisland.piczo.com
for info on how to joina nd set up your own server web client on my site coming soon

item.title: Web Client Localhost user files
item.dc:creator: @deficit deficit
item.description:
@deficit wrote:

ok, where does the web client store user files? i have an account that i did pickup 6585 (ammy of fury), when i tried to equip it it crashed me. now i can’t get back in because of the fury in my inventory, so i need to access the account file and take it out. anyone know where the WEB CLIENT (not batch client) stores your account files on LOCALHOST (not a hosted server). Thanks.[br][size=1]Posted at: September 17, 2006, 07:14:07 PM[/size][hr]By the way, the web client is running HybridScape server at 127.0.0.1, that’s where i’m trying to find my file.[br][size=1]Posted at: September 17, 2006, 07:18:32 PM[/size][hr]Nevermind i think i found it in C:windows.mpr_file_store_32characters
